description: Hogtied continues to bring its members hot new faces, bound and helpless, for your pleasure. Welcome Sarah Blake: tiny, sexy, flexible, pretty, and super wicked HOT. Sometimes a shoot goes so well that when you go to edit it, you find yourself just watching it. Over an hour long, this update rocks as we explore every part of Sarah. From tickling and foot punishment, to hard core fucking machines, and many hard orgasms. I can only say that Sarah was amazing and I hope you agree.
title: Sarah Blake
